tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ArTechnologyMonitoring (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    ar_device_id INT NOT NULL,
    ar_session_start TIMESTAMP,
    ar_session_end TIMESTAMP,
    misuse_detected BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE ar_activities (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    activity_description TEXT,
    activity_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES ar_users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ar_activity_logs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id UUID REFERENCES ar_devices(device_id),
    activity_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    activity_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    activity_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE AR_Users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    last_login TIMESTAMP
  )

CREATE TABLE AR_Sessions (
    session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES AR_Users(user_id),
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP
  )

CREATE TABLE AR_Actions (
    action_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    session_id INT REFERENCES AR_Sessions(session_id),
    action_description TEXT,
    action_timestamp TIMESTAMP
  )

CREATE TABLE AR_Permissions (
    permission_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    permission_name VARCHAR(50),
    permission_description TEXT
  )

CREATE TABLE AR_Permission_Assignments (
    assign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES AR_Users(user_id),
    permission_id INT REFERENCES AR_Permissions(permission_id)
  )
